description.narrative: By 2025, Children and families in urban areas have equitable access to basic WASH services including in humanitarian situations.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2025, Children and families in urban areas have equitable access to basic WASH services including in humanitarian situations.
